proposals.gesture: Move the cursor with the right hand, then raise the left hand to indicate the start of the selection, then move the right hand to start selection, then grab it with the right hand and move it to desired position. At the end he suggested to use one hand, index and thumb to select a group, pinch, then expand then move to select, then back to pinch, then grab and move
proposals.notes: The participant also suggested to use the keyboard in combination with the eyes movement, he suggested to press and hold s then move the eyes to select and then release to indicate the end of the selection

proposals.gesture: (similar to reorderGroup) Move the cursor with the right hand, then raise the left hand to indicate the start of the selection, then move the right hand to start selection, then grab it with the right hand and move it to desired position. Then he suggested to use one hand for selection using the thumb and index by pinching to indicate the start, then unpinch and move to select then pinch to indicate the end, then grab to move
proposals.reasons: I already used it in reorder group
proposals.notes: In Japanese you should select part of the words because there is no space in between the words.

proposals.example: How far had Morino lived in America?
proposals.gesture: Move the cursor with the right hand to the middle of the word, then pinch and move the hand to top to delete
proposals.reasons: So just get rid of it through it away

proposals.example: Tom is travelling to Berlin week (next)
proposals.gesture: Move the cursor with the right hand index, then just typing

proposals.example: How long have her had this fever?
proposals.gesture: Use the index and thumb to select the words, pinch to start selection, then move to select, then just move the hand to top to delete, then just type

proposals.example: What took you so long so long
proposals.gesture: (Similar to replaceGroup) Use the index and thumb to select the words, pinch to start selection, then move to select, then just move the hand to top to delete
proposals.reasons: Similar to replace group, i used it before

proposals.example: He likes to eat healthy when visiting visiting resturants
proposals.gesture: (Similar to replaceSingle) Move the cursor with the right hand to the middle of the word, then pinch and move the hand to top to delete

comments: He suggested that to select one word you can use just the whole hand to grab it, then do whatever you want. To select specific part of word or multiple words, then use the index and thumb, similar to chopsticks. It think it is important to consider the logic of other languages, e.g. with Japanese where there is no spaces between words
